overview: This all too important throwing series covers offense and defense in the upper body positions.  Learn some of Steve's safest throwing positions specifically from the under-over position, the collar tie and the two on one position.  It is important to know how to defend these positions as well as be able to score when needing the BIG points to win the match.  Live action examples add to the value of this excellent dvd.
title: Low Risk-High Percentage Throws
